## overview

this example demonstrates the **catppuccin mocha** theme for beamer presentations.

- warm, pastel colours
- easy on the eyes
- works with PDF output

## code example

```r
# fit a simple linear model
library(ggplot2)

model <- lm(mpg ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars)
summary(model)
```
